short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts tabs in idle so you can have all the tabs open

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Idles tabs that haven't been used in a while to allow the user to continue opening more and more tabs.

I'm sure you've learned that opening lots of tabs and leaving them open makes your computer feel sluggish. This is typically due to each tabs memory usage and any scripts running on those pages. 

This extension puts the tabs in a minimal memory and almost zero cpu usage state. What makes this tab different than others similar to it is that you can easily recover back from idle by either clicking a simple link or using the browser back button.
